column6: "One More Day," Part 2 of 4.  At his darkest hours, Peter Parker has always had one shoulder to lean on, one person who'd remind him who he is, was, and can be.  Now he's about to lose that person.  What would you do, if you only had "One More Day?"
column8: | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | colorist:Richard Isanove | inker:Danny K. Miki | penciller (cover):Joe Quesada
